snippet: The media giant and digital upstart intend to blur the lines between their two worlds and collaborate on programming, advertising and technology.
abstract: NBCUniversal invests $200 million in Vox Media, obtaining stake that values company at about $1 billion; also readies investment of $200 million in BuzzFeed.
lead_paragraph: The media giant and digital upstart intend to blur the lines between their two worlds and collaborate on programming, advertising and technology.

headline.main: NBCUniversal Invests $200 Million in Vox Media
headline.print_headline: Seeking a Foothold Online, NBCUniversal Invests in Vox Media and Eyes BuzzFeed
